paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We recruited 33 patients (27 males) with mean age 63.9 ± 10.8 years.
We recruited 33 patients (6 females) with mean age 63.9 ± 10.8 years.

functional_data.summary: The study evaluated electrophysiological features of neuropathy in ATTRv patients.

variants.segregation_data: The variants segregate with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The study included patients with various TTR mutations.
key_quotes: The neuropathy was classifiable as primary axonal in most patients.
The K-mean analysis showed the presence in our cohort of the two distinct clusters.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding TTR variants and penetrance were extracted.
